singles.vanbancauhoi: Listen to the chief announce to students. When is lunch ready?
Listen to David talking about the conference. How long did he talk in the speech?
The woman is walking into a local store. How much are the cleaning products?
Listen to the conversation between Douglas and Kay. Why does Douglas call Kay?
A man and woman are discussing their plans for the evening. What do the man and woman decide to do in the evening?
Listen to the director talking about sales of his company. How many copies of Freeze Frame magazine were sold?
Listen to Marry talking to Jane while waiting for James. What did they decide to do?
A woman shares her job with her friend. Why does she want to become a writer?
A woman tells her friend about her plans for the day. What is the woman going to do?
Listen to a woman explaining her morning routine to her friend. Why do women get up early?
A girl is talking about a film. What did she like best about the film?
Linda is talking about her mother. What do mother and daughter have in common?
Listen to a tour guide introducing the tour. Where will tea be served?

multiples.title: Đề 9 - Listening C14
multiples.des: Four people are talking about Protecting the environment . Complete the sentences below.

lstCauHoi.vanbangiaithich: "You know, it amazes me how much we throw away without thinking. I’ve started giving away my old clothes and furniture instead of dumping them. Think about it—someone else could really use what we consider junk. It's such a simple thing, but it keeps stuff out of landfills and helps people out. The more we share, the less we waste. Why let things rot in a corner when they could have a second life somewhere else? It makes me feel like I’m doing my part, even in small ways. Plus, it’s a good reminder that what’s old to me could be new to someone else."

"I think one of the biggest ways we can protect the environment is by changing what we buy. I only purchase products that are sustainably sourced or made from recycled materials. Every dollar we spend is like casting a vote for the kind of world we want. It’s crazy how much waste and pollution come from manufacturing—choosing eco-friendly products is a way to push back against that. Sure, it might cost a bit more sometimes, but isn’t the planet worth it? I mean, we talk a lot about big changes, but if everyone just started small, like switching to biodegradable packaging, we’d see a massive impact."

"I've started reusing containers for storing food. I was tired of buying plastic wrap and bags every month, just to toss them after one use. You don’t realize how much waste you produce until you try cutting it down. Now, I use glass jars and old containers to store leftovers, and it works just as well. Honestly, it makes me feel a little less guilty about all the plastic in my life. I’m not saying I’m perfect, but even this small habit makes a difference. And let’s be real—who needs more clutter in the kitchen, anyway?"

"I stopped buying commercial cleaning products altogether. Most of them are filled with harsh chemicals that are terrible for the environment—and probably for us, too. Now, I make my own cleaning solutions. Vinegar, baking soda, and a little lemon juice can handle pretty much anything around the house. It’s cheaper, safer, and I don’t feel like I’m dumping toxins down the drain every time I clean. People think it’s hard, but honestly, once you try it, it’s not that bad. We don’t need a cabinet full of chemicals to keep things tidy. Nature’s got it covered."

multiples.title: Đề 9 - Listening C15
multiples.des: Listen to two people discussing Community design. Read the opinions below and decide whose opinion matches the statements, the man, the woman, or both the man and the woman. You can listen to the discussion twice.

lstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: Building design can influence people's behavior._
Work communities and social communities are the same._
Technology has changed how community forms._
lstCauHoi.vanbangiaithich:
Man: You know, I believe building design can shape people’s behaviors and interactions from the start. When spaces are designed well, people feel comfortable and naturally start connecting."

Woman: "Of course, design matters, but there’s no shortcut to building real community connections. Creating community takes time and consistency, even in spaces that encourage interaction."

Man: "Really? But I also feel that work communities and social communities aren’t as different as we might think. Both require spaces that help people feel connected and valued, whether it’s at work or in social settings."

Woman: "I’m not sure I agree with that. Work communities and social communities serve very different purposes. In a social community, people gather out of personal interest and shared hobbies, but in work communities, people connect because of their job roles. That can affect how close they feel and how they interact with one another."

Man: "I see your point, but even in work communities, people still find ways to connect on a personal level. A good work environment encourages friendships that might go beyond work topics."

Woman: "That’s a good point. And with technology, people can now connect for both work and social reasons, even if they’re not physically together. But I still think it’s important to build spaces where people can gather in person."

Man: "Yes, I agree, but I think technology has really changed how communities form. It makes connecting so much easier, and people don’t always need to meet face-to-face to feel a sense of community."

Woman: "I see that, but I don’t think online connections can fully replace in-person gatherings. There’s a different energy when people come together in real spaces—something technology just can’t replicate."

Man: "I understand, but I feel that virtual spaces can be just as meaningful. Technology adds a new layer, making it possible for communities to thrive even across distances, and that’s valuable in its own way."

multiples.title: Đề 9 - Listening C16
multiples.des: Listen to a man talk about Life after university and answer the questions below.

lstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: How does life change for graduates after university?

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi: They feel more stressed about job seeking
They are likely to stick to their academic routines
They are likely to be more flexible and open-minded

lstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: What is a common characteristic of the job market after university?
lstCauHoi.vanbangiaithich: Life after university is quite an adventure, and I've learned a lot since graduating last year. The biggest change I've noticed is how different my daily routine is now. Unlike during my university days, I don't have a fixed schedule of classes and study sessions anymore. This has actually made me more adaptable and willing to try new things. I've found myself saying 'yes' to opportunities I might have passed up before, whether it's joining a new club or learning a new skill for work. Speaking of work, the job market was quite an eye-opener. I always heard that finding a job would be tough, but I didn't realize just how fierce the competition would be. It seems like every position has dozens, if not hundreds, of applicants. This means you really have to stand out to get noticed. On the bright side, this competitive environment has pushed me to improve my skills and broaden my network. I've attended more networking events in the past year than I ever did at university. While the job search can be stressful at times, I've found that staying positive and being open to different possibilities has helped me navigate this new chapter of my life.

multiples.title: Đề 9 - Listening C17
multiples.des: Listen to a man talk about a promotion campaign for a product and answer the questions below.

lstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: What is the main issue with the product's promotion campaign?
lstCauHoi.vanbangiaithich:
A company recently launched a new fitness supplement, PowerBoost, but its promotion campaign is facing some difficulties. One major issue is that the advertisements make exaggerated claims. The campaign promises that PowerBoost will dramatically increase strength and endurance in just a few days. However, many customers feel the results are not as powerful as advertised. While bold claims can attract attention, they also risk damaging trust if the product does not deliver as expected.

Another challenge is that PowerBoost is struggling to stand out in the market. Some may think the issue is pricing, but it is actually similar to its competitors. Others might assume it is hard to find, but it is already available in many stores. The real issue is that PowerBoost is too similar to many existing products, making it difficult for customers to see what makes it unique.

To succeed, the company needs to adjust its messaging and find a way to differentiate PowerBoost from other fitness supplements.

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi: It is using outdated advertising methods
It is not targeting the correct market

lstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: Why is the product struggling to stand out in the market?

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi: It is priced too high compared to its competitors
It is too similar to many existing products
It is not available in enough stores

readings.title: Đề 9 - Reading p1
readings.des:
Choose one word from the list for each gap. 

Dear David,

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: I love this place because everybody here is _.
I live in a flat near the university so I can _ to my class
Yesterday I met Lesly for the _ time - she is sharing the flat with me
She is studying French and she can _ five languages
Last night we went out for dinner _.

readings.title: Đề 9 - Reading p2
readings.des: The sentences below are from some directions. Put the sentences in the right order.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi:
Instruction of submitting files

First, you need to sign in to your account using your credentials.

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi: In your account, you have to click on the “Open a new window” button.
When you do this, a new window will be automatically opened for you.
Simply drag and drop the files into the designated area provided.
After that, go back to your account and click the submit button.
Finally, check your email to confirm that your submission was successful.

readings.title: Đề 9 - Reading p3
readings.des: The sentences below are from some directions. Put the sentences in the right order. The first sentence is done for you.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi:
Instruction to attend the conference

If you are coming to the conference, you have to follow these steps

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi: When you arrive at the conference hall, show booking number then receive a guide book
A staff member will note this down and give you a welcoming package
Inside you will find a schedule of events and the information of the speaker
If you would like to listen to his talk, it is in the midhall .
After finishes, there will be time for questions

readings.title: Đề 9 - Reading p4
readings.des:
Four people respond to a local reporter's question about their opinions on holidays. Read their answers and answer the questions below.

A

I have a limited budget for holidays because I am a student, so I usually choose to travel nearby or to places within the country. Because of this, I haven’t had the opportunity to travel abroad yet. I'm working on earning more, and hopefully, in the future, I'll be able to explore other countries. That will be my first time traveling overseas.

B

I once went on a hiking holiday, and it was a disaster. The weather was terrible, and I wasn't as prepared as I thought. I used to enjoy walking a lot, going on trails and exploring nature whenever I had the chance. However, now that I'm retired, my preferences have changed. I find more comfort in staying at home, reading, or spending time with family. 

C

Before I go on holiday, I always get a guidebook so I won’t miss out on any important places. I find beach trips boring and always avoid them. Instead, I prefer researching tourist attractions ahead of time and visiting those interesting spots. Exploring new places and learning about their history and culture is what makes travel exciting for me.

D

I want to relax when I'm on holiday, and I disagree with those who say going to the beach is boring. Last year, a friend invited me on a hiking trip, but I declined. However, my perspective has changed, and now I’m planning to go hiking in the near future. This time, I’ll closely follow the weather to ensure it doesn’t spoil the trip.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: Who wants to go on a mountaineering trip?_
Who likes to go for a walk?_
Who finds going to the beach boring?_
Who likes seeing tourist attractions?_
Who prefers to stay home on holidays?_
Who has never been abroad?_
Whose holiday requires good weather?_

readings.title: Đề 9 - Reading p5
readings.des:
Read the text. Match the headings to the paragraphs. There is one heading that you will not use.

                                                    The history of coffee

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi:
1._

The custom of drinking coffee started in the 1500s. Around that time, cafés began to open in places like Egypt and Ethiopia, though coffee was banned before that. Later, coffee made its way to Italy and spread throughout Europe. The Dutch even introduced coffee to Asia. Over time, drinking coffee became a common habit in many parts of the world, bringing people together in new ways.

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi: Coffee Encouraging the Art of Communication
The custom of drinking coffee began
The problems in a coffee economy
A remedy for  unjust revenue distribution
A habit that has become a big business
The habit of drinking coffee in Europe
The health risks versus health benefits debate

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi:
2._

Europe is known as the biggest coffee-drinking region. In the 18th century, writers, philosophers, and politicians used coffee as a way to stay alert during intense discussions or meetings. Coffeehouses became popular meeting spots where people shared ideas and debated important topics. These places helped encourage the exchange of intellectual thoughts and played a key role in business and social life at the time.

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi: Coffee Encouraging the Art of Communication
The custom of drinking coffee began
The problems in a coffee economy
A remedy for unjust revenue distribution
A habit that has become a big business
The habit of drinking coffee in Europe
The health risks versus health benefits debate

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi:
3._

Today, many people drink coffee in the morning to wake up, or in the evening to socialize after work. Coffeehouses are everywhere, offering places to chat and relax. Coffee has grown into a global business, with coffee machines even sold for private homes. Famous global brands have become well-known for their coffee, using strong branding and marketing strategies to attract millions of coffee lovers worldwide.

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi: Coffee Encouraging the Art of Communication
The custom of drinking coffee began
The problems in a coffee economy
A remedy for unjust revenue distribution
A habit that has become a big business
The habit of drinking coffee in Europe
The health risks versus health benefits debate

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi:
4._
Europe consumes 90% of the world's coffee production, making it the largest market. Countries like Egypt and Ethiopia rely heavily on exporting coffee to support their economies. However, there is an issue of inequality: workers in coffee-producing countries often face poor working and living conditions. While coffee brings in money for these nations, the people producing it don’t always receive fair pay for their hard work.

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi: Coffee Encouraging the Art of Communication
The custom of drinking coffee began
The problems in a coffee economy
A remedy for unjust revenue distribution
A habit that has become a big business
The habit of drinking coffee in Europe
The health risks versus health benefits debate

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi:
5._

To address these inequalities, certification programs for agricultural products were introduced. If coffee meets certain certification standards, it can be sold at a fair price, preventing it from being sold too cheaply. However, critics argue that only about 5% of coffee gets certified. Many small coffee producers are too poor to afford the certification fees, which keeps them even further behind in the global market.

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi: Coffee Encouraging the Art of Communication
The custom of drinking coffee began
The problems in a coffee economy
A remedy for unjust revenue distribution
A habit that has become a big business
The habit of drinking coffee in Europe
The health risks versus health benefits debate

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi:
6._

Coffee has several benefits. It contains antioxidants, which can help prevent diseases. However, there are also some risks. It is not recommended to drink coffee with added flavors or sweeteners because these can be harmful to your health. If you drink pure black coffee, it’s usually fine. Just remember to avoid adding too many unhealthy ingredients to your cup of coffee to stay on the safe side.

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi: Coffee Encouraging the Art of Communication
The custom of drinking coffee began
The problems in a coffee economy
A remedy for unjust revenue distribution
A habit that has become a big business
The habit of drinking coffee in Europe
The health risks versus health benefits debate

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi:
7._

According to legend, a man in an old country once visited another land where he saw a bird eating coffee beans. The bird became much more active than usual. Curious, the man decided to try the beans himself. After eating them, he felt more energetic and awake. This was how he discovered the amazing effects of coffee, which eventually became known to the rest of the world.

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi: Coffee Encouraging the Art of Communication
The custom of drinking coffee began
The problems in a coffee economy
A remedy for unjust revenue distribution
A habit that has become a big business
The habit of drinking coffee in Europe
The health risks versus health benefits debate

speakings.title: Đề 9 - Speaking p1
speakings.des:
In this part, I am going to ask you three short questions about yourself and your interests. You will have 30 seconds to reply to each question.

Begin speaking when you hear this sound.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: What did you do last night?
LstCauHoi.vanbangiaithich:
Version 1: 

Let me tell you about what I did last night. Last night, I went to the cinema ( where) to watch “Tom and Jerry” ( what). It was about a cat named Tom chasing a mouse named Jerry. It helped me relax and reduce stress after a long day at work. I felt very happy. That’s my answer. 
Version 2: 

I will tell you about what I did last night. 

I went to the cinema with my friend on Sunday evening. We watched the film named Tom and Jerry. The movie was so interesting. I felt so excited because it helped me relax and reduce stress. That’s my answer.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: What is your favorite season?
LstCauHoi.vanbangiaithich:
Version 1: 

Let me tell you about my favorite season. I like summer ( what) because ( why) I can do outdoor activities with my friends on the weekends. It helps me keep fit and remain healthy. I feel very happy / excited/ comfortable about that. That’s my answer. 
Version 2: 

My favorite time of year is spring. At this time, the weather is warm. Moreover, Spring is a time when my family can reunite, and we can rest after a year of hard work. I love spring very much.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: What is your favorite movie star?
LstCauHoi.vanbangiaithich:
Version1: 

Let me tell you about my favorite movie star. He is Son Tung, he is very handsome , helpful and friendly. When I watch his films, it allows me to broaden my social knowledge. I feel very useful . That’s my answer. 
Version 2: 

Let me tell you about my favorite film star. Her name is Anna, who will be turning 26 years old next month.

I have known her for 6 months 

To me , Vy is a friendly person because she is very easy to make friends

speakings.title: Đề 9 - Speaking p3
speakings.des:
In this part, I'm going to ask you to compare two pictures, and I will then ask you two questions about them. You will have 45 seconds for each response.

Begin speaking when you hear this sound.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: Describe these 2 pictures
LstCauHoi.vanbangiaithich:
Both pictures show me about tourist destinations.

In the first picture, I can see a lot of people on the beach. They are wearing bikinis. It is clear that they are lying on the beach and swimming. 

In the second picture,  I can see a girl and the mountain. The girl is wearing a T-shirt. She is looking at the lake. 

I guess all of them are feeling happy. 

I prefer the second picture because I like being alone.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: What are the attractions of visiting 2 places?
LstCauHoi.vanbangiaithich:
Each place has its own attractions. 

In the first picture,  the attraction is to help people make friends who have the same hobby and gain more experience.

In the second picture, it is a wonderful way to relax and reduce stress after a long day at work.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: What are the benefits of being alone from time to time?
LstCauHoi.vanbangiaithich:
from time to time: thi thoảng 

There are many benefits of being alone from time to time. 

First, it is good for health 

Second, it is a good way to relax and reduce stress after a long day at work.

For me , I like being alone when I feel sad.

speakings.title: Đề 9 - Speaking p2
speakings.des:
In this part, I'm going to ask you to describe a picture. Then I will ask you two questions about it. You will have 45 seconds for each response.

Begin speaking when you hear this sound.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: Describe this picture
LstCauHoi.vanbangiaithich:
In the picture, I can see 2 people in a shopping mall
In the background, I can see a lot of clothes hanging in the wall
In the front, there are 2 men wearing casual clothes
It is clear that they are looking at clothes 
I guess they are having a good time because I can see the smile on their face
To be honest, this picture is so beautiful that it might have been taken by a professional.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: Tell me about the last time you went shopping for clothes
LstCauHoi.vanbangiaithich:
Let me tell you about the last time I went shopping for clothes

( when) Yesterday, I went shopping for clothes with my friends ( who) 

We went to Aeon mall ( where) on Saturday morning ( when) 

We felt very happy because it helped relax and reduce stress after a long day at work.

That’s my answer.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: Why do some people dislike going shopping for clothes?
LstCauHoi.vanbangiaithich:
Let me tell you about Why some people dislike going shopping for clothes.

  • First, they may not feel comfortable.
  • Second, shopping for clothes takes a lot of time and money
  • Finally, people like other activities , such as listening to music or watching TV because it allows them to relax and reduce stress after a long time at work.

speakings.title: Đề 9 - Speaking p4
speakings.des:
In this part, I'm going to show you a picture and ask you three questions. You will have one minute to think about your answers before you start speaking. You will have two minutes to answer all three questions.

Begin speaking when you hear this sound. Look at the photograph.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi:
What are the different ways you use the Internet?

How do you feel when you use the Internet?

Some people say that the Internet has a bad impact on our lives. What do you think?
LstCauHoi.vanbangiaithich:
Regarding the first question, I use the Internet in several ways. Firstly, I spend 2 hours playing games or watching videos on YouTube. Watching videos not only helps me enhance my communication and logical thinking skills but also broadens my knowledge about various aspects of life. 

Secondly, I often surf  Facebook to update the news, which helps me expand my social knowledge.


Turning to the second question, I am so excited when using the Internet. Like many young people today, I cannot stop looking at the screen, or I will feel scared.


As for the final question, I disagree that the Internet has a bad impact on our lives for several reasons. This is because the Internet has many benefits, such as expanding people’s social knowledge or making friends from all over the world. 


That’s my answer. Thank you for listening.

writings.title: Đề 9 - Writing part 1
writings.des: You want to join the Fitness club. You have 5 messages from a member of the club. Write short answers (1–5 words) to each message. Recommended time: 3 minutes.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: What is your favorite food?
What is your favorite color?

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi: It’s blue. / My favorite color is blue/ I like blue.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: Where did you go last night?
What do you do on the weekend?
What is the most popular sport in your country?

writings.title: Đề 9 - Writing p2
writings.des: You want to join the Fitness club. Fill in the form. Write in sentences. Use 20 – 30 words. Recommended time: 7 minutes.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: Tell us about the last time you had to run somewhere.

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi: The last time I had to run was last month. I ran in a park near my house. It was a good way to stay in shape and remain healthy. Besides, running helped me to relax my mind after a long day at school.

writings.title: Đề 9 - Writing p3
writings.des: You are communicating with other members of the club in the chat room. Reply to their questions. Write in sentences. Use 30–40 words per answer. Recommended time: 10 minutes.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: A: How did you hear about the Health club?

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi: I heard about the Health Club from my close friends who are members of it. They gave me lots of tips to keep fit that they’ve learned from this club. I see it is very useful and want to join.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: B: What do you want to achieve when joining the club?

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi: When I choose to attend our club, I want to add a lot of new friends who have the same passion for health as me to gain more knowledge about health. It's a wonderful way for me to have more new friends and broaden my mind about health knowledge.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: C: Do you have any opinions about the facilities in the gym?

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi: Yes, I do. I think that the facilities in the gym are really good. The equipment here is so modern and we only pay about 4 dollars each month. Thanks to facilities in the gym, we can remain healthy and stay in shape.

writings.title: Đề 9 - Writing p4
writings.des:
You are a member of the Health club. You received this email from the club’s manager.

Dear Member,

The club’s instructors will be absent for the next 2 weeks. You can still use the club's equipment, but there won't be any instructor support. Please kindly understand this situation.

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: Write an email to your friend. Tell your friend about your feelings and opinions. 50 words.

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi:
Hi Tom,
How is it going? I hope you and your family are well.
Have you received the email from our club?
It's a bit disappointing as I enjoy their guidance. I think that we should work out ( = exercise) following the instructor through YouTube channels. I suppose ( = think) it is a wonderful way to practice effectively. 
What would you think about this?
Hope to hear from you soon.
John

LstCauHoi.vanbancauhoi: Write an email to the manager of the club. Tell the manager about your feelings and suggestions. 120 – 150 words.

lstdapan.vanbanphanhoi:
Dear Club Manager,
My name is Henry. I have been a member of our club for 2 months.
I am writing in response to your latest email.
According to the news, the club’s instructors will be absent for the next 2 weeks
To be honest, I am very worried to hear that news.
I would love to venture ( = express) my idea. It is advisable for us to follow coaches ( = instructors) on social media, such as through videos on Facebook or YouTube. I believe this could help members not only practice effectively but also stay motivated. Moreover, I suggest finding an expert who has a lot of knowledge and experience in the health area to support members during this time. By implementing these new strategies, the experience of our members can be improved. As a result, we can attract more people to join our club. 
I hope my suggestions will be useful.
I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards,
Henry.
